ygData.subject: RE: Concert Hall
ygData.msgSnippet: ... i got this song as soon as it was released, and used it once then realized it also caused damage on myself if too close.  i did not start using it for long
ygData.messageBody:
> song: Denon's Desparate Dirge, Lev 43, this site says damage
> is 311+(lev-43)*2 making MAX dame at Lev 50 only 325, and
> does not say anything about mana; CH says it does 275 dam and
> requires 800mana?

i got this song as soon as it was released, and used it once then realized
it also caused damage on myself if too close. i did not start using it for
long after, but i now use it with caution and it absolutely does AE 325dmg
at level 50.

>
> Instrument: Mistmore battle drums: this site says +20%; CH says +25%

i heard it was 20% but have not done the testing that others on the list
have. i believe the mm drum is 20% and selo's drum of march is 30% (i have
missed the last 3 nagafen raids all of which dropped a drum, grrrr).

>
> Instrument: Lute of the gypsy princes: this site says no
> effect; CH says +5%

i gave mine to Cryssia a long time ago and never got another to test, but i
believe it has no effect. and i STILL need to test Kelin's Seven Stringed
Lute. i think it may be 20% increase give or take, but i am very forgetful
and have yet to make sure.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server
